titles.title: To provide compensation for the families of noncombatants killed in United States military actions in Afghanistan after September 11, 2001.
To provide compensation for the families of noncombatants killed in United States military actions in Afghanistan after September 11, 2001.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: Directs the Secretary of State to provide for the payment of $10,000 to the family of each noncombatant national of Afghanistan killed as a direct result of U.S. military actions in Afghanistan after September 11, 2001.
